name: The Grub
description:
After many confused hours outdoors, you find a building with a sturdy door. Faceless soldiers wait for you inside.

Play The Grub online here.

You must remain connected to the internet while playing the game in order for it to work.

--

Download the source files for The Grub on this page. The game was built from a .tws file created in Twine 1.4.2. If you build the game and run it locally, the online functionality may not work. I can only guarantee the game will work on my website.
